name: Zombozo - A Game About having fun
name_original: Zombozo - A Game About having fun
description:
New update : version 0.2.1

- Added 10 waves

- Added 2 bosses on stages 5 and 10

- New weapon upgrade

- Max health upgrade

- Enemy stats are lowered

- Mini bosses appear in some waves

- Wave 10 boss is on >insane Mode<

(Sometimes next wave glitches and wont spawn in that situation Press "O" to manually start the next wave Caution! : Don't use this when you are not glitched)

join me on my discord : https://discord.gg/k3h7gjpHSh
